challenge.damage.info: Only damage done by attacks and Abilities counts toward this challenge. Damage done by Special Conditions does not count.
challenge.darknessevolution.info: All {D} Evolution cards, including Mega Evolution Pokémon, count toward this challenge.
challenge.dragonevolution.info: All {N} Evolution cards, including Mega Evolution Pokémon, count toward this challenge.
challenge.fairyevolution.info: All {Y} Evolution cards, including Mega Evolution Pokémon, count toward this challenge.
challenge.fightingevolution.info: All {F} Evolution cards, including Mega Evolution Pokémon, count toward this challenge.
challenge.fireevolution.info: All {R} Evolution cards, including Mega Evolution Pokémon, count toward this challenge.
challenge.firethemedeck.info: You can use any theme deck to win this challenge as long as it has {R} Pokémon in it.
challenge.grassevolution.info: All {G} Evolution cards, including Mega Evolution Pokémon, count toward this challenge.
challenge.grassthemedeck.info: You can use any theme deck to win this challenge as long as it has {G} Pokémon in it.
challenge.knockout.info: Only Knock Outs resulting from attacks and Abilities count toward this challenge. A Knock Out that results from a Special Condition does not count.
challenge.lightningevolution.info: All {L} Evolution cards, including Mega Evolution Pokémon, count toward this challenge.
challenge.metalevolution.info: All {M} Evolution cards, including Mega Evolution Pokémon, count toward this challenge.
challenge.psychicevolution.info: All {P} Evolution cards, including Mega Evolution Pokémon, count toward this challenge.
challenge.waterevolution.info: All {W} Evolution cards, including Mega Evolution Pokémon, count toward this challenge.
challenge.waterthemedeck.info: You can use any theme deck to win this challenge as long as it has {W} Pokémon in it.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.archetypes: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Beedrill-EX.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to your opponent's Pokémon.
Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.
login.registration.complete.body.ios: We have sent you an email to verify your account. When you verify your account, we'll give you a reward! In the meantime, tap Continue to log in to the Pokémon Trading Card Game Online!
